title: Impossible to end the leavebuster
body: Everytime I wait the 20 minutes of the punishment the client diconnect me.It's been 1 hours that I've wait but thre is always the 5 same game that I have to wait.

replies.body:
Client disconnections are typically seen as a result of one or more network settings that conflict with League. Working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will ensure your local network settings are configured properly for League and aren't causing an issue here.

Let me know if this resolved the problem.
